trans-unit.source: Resolves security context tokens.
trans-unit.target: 解析安全性內容權杖。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SecurityContextSecurityTokenResolver"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SecurityContextSecurityTokenResolver"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: If `removeOldestTokensOnCacheFull` is `false`, `AddContext` throws a <xref:System.ServiceModel.QuotaExceededException> if the cache capacity has been reached.
trans-unit.target: 如果`removeOldestTokensOnCacheFull`是`false`，`AddContext`會擲回<xref:System.ServiceModel.QuotaExceededException>如果已達到快取容量。</xref:System.ServiceModel.QuotaExceededException>

trans-unit.source: The size of the security context cache.
trans-unit.target: 安全性內容快取大小。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the oldest tokens should be removed when the cache is full; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果要移除最舊的權杖，當快取已滿。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SecurityContextSecurityTokenResolver"></xref> class with the specified security context cache capacity and clock skew maximum.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SecurityContextSecurityTokenResolver"></xref>類別具有指定的安全性內容快取容量和時鐘誤差最大值。

trans-unit.source: The size of the security context cache.
trans-unit.target: 安全性內容快取大小。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the oldest tokens should be removed when the cache is full; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果要移除最舊的權杖，當快取已滿。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The maximum allowable time difference between client and server clock settings.
trans-unit.target: 用戶端和伺服器時鐘設定最大允許時間差異。

trans-unit.source: Adds a security context security token to the token cache.
trans-unit.target: 安全性內容的安全性權杖加入權杖快取。

trans-unit.source: The security context token.
trans-unit.target: 安全性內容權杖。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SecurityContextSecurityTokenResolver.RemoveOldestTokensOnCacheFull*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> and the cache capacity has been reached or exceeded.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SecurityContextSecurityTokenResolver.RemoveOldestTokensOnCacheFull*>屬性是<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>和快取容量已達到或超過。</xref:System.ServiceModel.Security.Tokens.SecurityContextSecurityTokenResolver.RemoveOldestTokensOnCacheFull*>

trans-unit.source: Clears the token cache of content.
trans-unit.target: 清除 權杖快取的內容。

trans-unit.source: Returns the maximum allowable time difference between client and server clock settings.
trans-unit.target: 傳回用戶端和伺服器時鐘設定之間的最大允許時間差異。

trans-unit.source: The maximum allowable time difference between client and server clock settings.
trans-unit.target: 用戶端和伺服器時鐘設定最大允許時間差異。

trans-unit.source: Gets a collection of security context security token IDs that match a specified context ID.
trans-unit.target: 取得集合的安全性內容之安全性權杖識別碼的比對指定的內容識別碼。

trans-unit.source: The specified security context ID.
trans-unit.target: 指定的安全性內容識別碼。

trans-unit.source: A generic collection of security context tokens.
trans-unit.target: 安全性內容權杖的泛型集合。

trans-unit.source: Gets the security context security token ID that matches a specified context ID and generation.
trans-unit.target: 取得安全性內容權杖之安全性識別碼與指定之內容識別碼及產生相符。

trans-unit.source: The specified security context ID.
trans-unit.target: 指定的安全性內容識別碼。

trans-unit.source: The generation.
trans-unit.target: 層代。

trans-unit.source: The matching security context token.
trans-unit.target: 比對的安全性內容權杖。

trans-unit.source: Removes all tokens from the cache that match a given context ID.
trans-unit.target: 從符合指定的內容識別碼的快取移除所有的權杖。

trans-unit.source: The specified security context ID.
trans-unit.target: 指定的安全性內容識別碼。

trans-unit.source: Removes the token from the cache that matches a given context ID and generation.
trans-unit.target: 從與提供的內容識別碼及產生相符的快取移除語彙基元。

trans-unit.source: The specified security context ID.
trans-unit.target: 指定的安全性內容識別碼。

trans-unit.source: The generation.
trans-unit.target: 層代。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the oldest tokens should be removed when the cache is full.
trans-unit.target: 取得值，指出快取已滿時，是否應該移除最舊的權杖。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the oldest tokens should be removed when the cache is full; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果要移除最舊的權杖，當快取已滿。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the security context token cache size.
trans-unit.target: 取得安全性內容權杖快取大小。

trans-unit.source: The security context token cache size.
trans-unit.target: 安全性內容權杖快取大小。

trans-unit.source: Attempts to add a token to the cache.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試將權杖加入至快取。

trans-unit.source: The security context token.
trans-unit.target: 安全性內容權杖。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the token was added successfully to the cache; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果權杖已成功新增至快取。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The token is .
trans-unit.target: The token is .

trans-unit.source: The token date or time is outside limits.
trans-unit.target: token 日期或時間已超出限制。

trans-unit.source: Attempts to resolve the security key core, given a specified key identifier clause.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試在提供指定之金鑰識別碼子句之下解析安全性金鑰核心。

trans-unit.source: The security key identifier clause.
trans-unit.target: 安全性金鑰識別碼子句。

trans-unit.source: When this method returns, contains resolved key core.
trans-unit.target: 當這個方法會傳回包含解析的金鑰核心。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is passed uninitialized.
trans-unit.target: 這個參數未初始化便傳遞。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the key core was successfully resolved; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果金鑰核心已成功解析。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Attempts to resolve the token, given a specified key identifier.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試在提供指定的金鑰識別項之下解析權杖。

trans-unit.source: The security key identifier.
trans-unit.target: 安全性金鑰識別碼。

trans-unit.source: When this method returns, contains the resolved key core.
trans-unit.target: 當這個方法會傳回包含解析的金鑰核心。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is passed uninitialized.
trans-unit.target: 這個參數未初始化便傳遞。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the key token was successfully resolved; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果金鑰權杖已成功解析。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Attempts to resolve the token, given a specified key identifier clause.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試在提供指定之金鑰識別碼子句之下解析權杖。

trans-unit.source: The security key identifier clause.
trans-unit.target: 安全性金鑰識別碼子句。

trans-unit.source: When this method returns, contains the resolved key core.
trans-unit.target: 當這個方法會傳回包含解析的金鑰核心。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is passed uninitialized.
trans-unit.target: 這個參數未初始化便傳遞。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the key token was successfully resolved; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果金鑰權杖已成功解析。否則， <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Updates the expiration date for a token in the cache.
trans-unit.target: 更新快取中權杖的到期日。

trans-unit.source: The security context.
trans-unit.target: 安全性內容。

trans-unit.source: The new expiration time and date.
trans-unit.target: 新的到期時間和日期。
